source.name: Project Information Portal (PIP)
source.description: The PIP is a data collection portal on the General Services Administration's (GSA) Public Buildings Service's (PBS) Prospectus Projects.  Prospectus projects are defined as those exceeding the $2.3 M threshold.  Data from these projects is rolled up to give a summary of the New Construction, Lease, and Major Repair and Alteration programs in the areas of Scope, Schedule, Budget, and Condition.
